alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gulf; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 25 at 9:45AM EST until January 25 at 10:15AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1015 AM EST/915 AM CST/. * At 945 AM EST/845 AM CST/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 18 miles west of Crawfordville to 20 miles south of Port St. Joe, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, St. Marks, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Woodville, Crawfordville, St George Island, Wakulla, Franklin, Sopchoppy, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Royal Bluff, Wakulla Springs, St George Island St Pk, Eight Mile Pond, Beverly, Panacea, Poplar Camp and Medart. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST/1000 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST/1000 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.
